verbs.description: i [V: was] observing the reformation before it was coolreformation for dummies lutherans love their freedom social gospelers and liberation theologians love their justice i find myself inhabiting the space that attempts to say we 're really free in christ and justice really matters doctor clint schnekloth founder mcsweeney jean vanier troeltsch lutheran confessions president reformers america weber karl barth
